source.32caeebd:
def create_fruits(subscriber, scheduler):
    subscriber.on_next("Apple")
    subscriber.on_next("Orange")
    subscriber.on_next("Pineapple")
    subscriber.on_next("Melon")
    subscriber.on_next("Strawberry")
    subscriber.on_completed()

publihser = create(create_fruits)
source.b85b002e:
publihser.subscribe(
    on_next = lambda i: print("Received {0}".format(i)),
    on_error = lambda e: print("Error Occurred: {0}".format(e)),
    on_completed = lambda: print("Done!"),
)
source.9fbecc10:
publisher -> subscriber 

on_next event : send data 

on_completed : complete data
